Provides methods to delete dynamically generated images by the Web application.
Starts a thread to delete images in the viewers' virtual directory.

param.para: The time in milliseconds that the image cleaner sleeps before scanning and cleaning up image files in the dynamic image directory.

param.name: age
param.para: The age in milliseconds of a file before it is deleted.

param.name: application
param.para: The state of the ASP.NET application.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Web.CrystalImageCleaner.Stop(System.Web.HttpApplicationState)

summary.para: Stops the thread that handles the image deletion process and removes the CrystalImageCleaner instance that exists in the Web application state.

member.param: The state of the ASP.NET application.

Specifies the ASP.NET life cycle stages in the AspNetLifeCycleStage property of the ErrorEventArgs Class.
The load ViewState stage in the ASP.NET life cycle. Initialized objects receive ViewState information that has been persisted on the Web server.
The object initialization stage in the ASP.NET life cycle. Objects are declared and initialized.
The object load stage in the ASP.NET life cycle. Objects are displayed on the page and code is executed.
The prerender stage in the ASP.NET life cycle. Objects can be modified before they are saved or persisted to ViewState.
The raise PostBack event stage in the ASP.NET life cycle. Objects are checked whether their data have been changed.
The render stage in the ASP.NET life cycle. Objects are rendered in HTML for display to the Web browser.
The save to ViewState stage in the ASP.NET life cycle. Objects that have been modified are saved to ViewState.
An unknown stage in the ASP.NET life cycle.
Provides data for the Error event in the CrystalReportViewerBase class.
Gets the exception that is thrown by the ASP.NET life cycle.
Gets the ASP.NET life cycle stage.
Gets or sets the error message.
